resources.string: From here, you can find users by giving user\'s email. After finding valid user, as an Admin user you have privilege to change user\'s role.
Invalid name, email or issue on searching. Please verify the provided name or email.
This is to assign new role to selected user. You can select any predefined user roles in the app and assign that to user. Below drop-down menu already selected the current role of the selected user.
Basic information and available contact details about selected user.
